official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to treat ventilators, aspirators, and certain other items as miscellaneous items of durable medical equipment for purposes of determining the amount of payment for such items under part B of the medicare program.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to treat ventilators, aspirators, and certain other items as miscellaneous items of durable medical equipment for purposes of determining payment for such items under Medicare part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance).

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to treat ventilators, aspirators, and certain other items as miscellaneous items of durable medical equipment for purposes of determining the amount of payment for such items under part B of the medicare program.
